overview:
Christian Schwarzer has extensive experience in developing and implementing business strategies for large corporations as well as small start-up companies. In 2009 he joined DSwiss as Head of Business Development before being appointment to the role of CEO on February 2011. He was previously employed by a leading Swiss-based consultancy where he lead numerous strategy and innovation projects in the IT and telecommunications sector.

During his career, Christian has held positions with the technology company, Intel, as well as Ericsson, the worldâ€™s largest telecommunications supplier. He holds a Master of Science in Communication Systems Engineering and a Master of Advanced Studies in Management, Technology and Economics from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH) in Lausanne and Zurich respectively.
